full_summary:
# RADARSAT-1 Open Data Tender
## Background Information
Issued by: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Client: Canadian Space Agency (CSA)
## Tender Information
### Reference and Identification
* Reference Number: WS3723655057-Doc3735712191
* Solicitation Number: WS3723655057
* Tender Status: Expired
### Submission Timing and Requirements
* Tender Closing Date: Tuesday, January 3, 2023 (at 14:00 HNE)
* Late submissions will be deemed non-responsive
### Scope of Work
* The Canadian Space Agency (CSA), through the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), is seeking proposals to make RADARSAT-1 (R-1) data publicly available as open data
* The resulting contract is expected to commence on January 25, 2023, with a project end date of June 30, 2023
### Contract Oversight and Delivery
* The contract will be administered by the PSPC on behalf of the CSA
* Deliverables will be provided to the CSA at the following address:
    * Canadian Space Agency
    * 6767 Route de l'Aéroport
    * Saint-Hubert, Quebec
### Contact Information
* Contracting Authority:
    + Marie-Claude Lussier (SPAC/PSPC)
    + Email: [marie-claude.lussier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:marie-claude.lussier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
### Tender Documentation
* Request for Proposal (RFP) documents can be accessed through the linked URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14538978?extsite=MTQ1Mzg5NzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14538978?extsite=MTQ1Mzg5NzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* Please direct all inquiries regarding the RFP to the contracting authority
### Notice
Please note that the RFP has expired. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions have been closed, and no further actions will be accepted. 

Would you like me to answer additional questions about this rewritten entry, or assist you further?
